snippet: The Obama campaign found supporters by culling never-before-used data about viewing habits and combining it with more personal information.
abstract: Important factor that contributed Pres Obama's re-election victory was the culling of never-before-used data about television viewing habits and combining it with more personal information to find supporters; system allowed campaign to direct advertising with previously unprecedented level of efficiency, beating better-financed Republican opposition in the ad wars.
lead_paragraph: The Obama campaign found supporters by culling never-before-used data about viewing habits and combining it with more personal information.

headline.seo: Obama System, ‘the Optimizer,’ Targeted TV Viewers for Support
headline.main: Secret of the Obama Victory? Rerun Watchers, for One Thing
headline.print_headline: Secret of the Obama Victory? Rerun Watchers, for One Thing
